branchCategory.name: ZZK2, Manifold for ZK2 Vacuum Unit
branchCategory.description: <p>The ZK2 series is an energy-saving generator with 90% reduced air consumption.  It has a 50% increase in suction flow compared to other single stage SMC generators.  With its compact size and light weight, it is easier to maintain. The ZK2 also has various mounting options to choose from.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ZZK2, Manifold for ZK2 Vacuum Unit
